table-body.svelte
files.content:
<script>
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils";
	let className = undefined;
	export { className as class };
</script>

<tbody class={cn("[&_tr:last-child]:border-0", className)} {...$$restProps}>
	<slot />
</tbody>

files.content:

	import { cn } from "$lib/utils";
	let className = undefined;
	export { className as class };
</script>

<caption class={cn("mt-4 text-sm text-muted-foreground", className)} {...$$restProps}>
	<slot />
</caption>

table-footer.svelte
files.content:

	import { cn } from "$lib/utils";
	let className = undefined;
	export { className as class };
</script>

<tfoot class={cn("bg-primary font-medium text-primary-foreground", className)} {...$$restProps}>

files.name: table-head.svelte
files.content:
<script>
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils";
	let className = undefined;
	export { className as class };
</script>

<th
	class={cn(
		"h-12 px-4 text-left align-middle font-medium text-muted-foreground [&:has([role=checkbox])]:pr-0",
		className
	)}
	{...$$restProps}
>
	<slot />
</th>

files.name: table-header.svelte
files.content:
<script>
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils";
	let className = undefined;
	export { className as class };
</script>

<!-- svelte-ignore a11y-no-noninteractive-element-interactions -->
<thead class={cn("[&_tr]:border-b", className)} {...$$restProps} on:click on:keydown>
	<slot />
</thead>

files.name: table-row.svelte
files.content:
<script>
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils";
	let className = undefined;
	export { className as class };
</script>

<tr
	class={cn(
		"border-b transition-colors hover:bg-muted/50 data-[state=selected]:bg-muted",
		className
	)}
	{...$$restProps}
	on:click
	on:keydown
>
	<slot />
</tr>

files.name: table.svelte
